content.raw:
I'm testing the example world using the playstation joystick on Xenial and :

* after the first few messages, messages keep being published but the timestamp doesn't change. I also put a print statement next to the lines which set the timestamp and saw that they stop being called after a while.
* Buttons / axes don't seem to be updated even for a single iteration
content.html:
I'm testing the example world using the playstation joystick on Xenial and :

  • after the first few messages, messages keep being published but the timestamp doesn't change. I also put a print statement next to the lines which set the timestamp and saw that they stop being called after a while.
  • Buttons / axes don't seem to be updated even for a single iteration
